Lenovo x3850 X6 Server

Description: The Lenovo System x3850 X6 server, machine type 6241, is a four-socket 4U rack-mounted server that represents the sixth generation of the Enterprise X-Architecture. Now with Intel Xeon E7 v4 processors, the x3850 X6 delivers fast application performance, is based on an agile system design, and is a resilient platform that is needed for mission-critical databases, enterprise applications, and virtualized environments.

Processor: 4 x Intel Xeon E7-4820 v4 @2.00Ghz / 10 Cores / 20 Threads / 25MB Cache

Memory: 256GB DDR4

Storage: No Storage Drives

Warranty: Based on the serial number, the server has Lenovo Warranty until 2022-10-31.

Condition: Pulled from working environment. Cleaned, Tested, Working condition.

Additional Information: No OS, no COA, No software licenses

Power cords will be included for free if requested

Part numbers may be different due to manufacturer revisions, for reference only.

FREE SHIPPING TO CANADA AND CONTINENTAL US ONLY.

DUE TO THE SIZE AND WEIGHT OF THE ITEM, SHIPPING WILL MOST SURELY BE FREIGHT.

entry.title: IBM X3650 M4 Barebone Server / NO CPU / NO RAM / NO HDD / LGA 2011 Socket
entry.s:type: Computers/Tablets & Networking:Enterprise Networking, Servers:Servers, Clients & Terminals:Computer Servers
entry.summary:
Vendor: IBM
Type: Computers/Tablets & Networking:Enterprise Networking, Servers:Servers, Clients & Terminals:Computer Servers
Price: 99.99




IBM X3650 M4 2U Server

Barebone IBM server, build it to your own specs. 2U rackmount size. Perfect for FTP servers, PLEX servers, VMWARE, and many other applications.


Please read all of these frequently asked questions before purchasing


What is required to get this going? Processor, RAM, Hard Drive.

Which processor do I need? Intel Xeon 2011 socket v1 or v2

How many processors? 2 processor sockets

Are the heat sinks provided? yes, both

Which RAM do I need? DDR3 ECC

How many RAM slots? 24 (12 Per CPU)

Are hard drive caddys included? No

Does this fit SAS drives? Yes, 2.5"

Will a normal 2.5" SATA drive fit and function? Yes

I bought this and bent the CPU pins while installing the processor, does your warrant cover that? No, be careful when installing the CPU.

Is there any bios password or security which will prevent me from using this server? No


Please understand that this is a barebone system and will not function if you are planning to simply plug it in after purchasing. You need to understand the compatibility of the parts and have the technical ability to install the parts. Our warranty will not cover any damage caused by incompetence.


**Rackmount rails and operating system are not included**

Terms and Conditions

Product will not be shipped until payment is received.
